blogPost.excerpt: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
blogPost.body: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
blogPost.title: Block Party - Bye-bye, Twitter trolls 👋
blogPost.author: Tracy Chou

localize.description: Block Party打造的工具可以防止网络滥用。我们的使命是通过构建用户控制、保护和安全的解决方案来创造更安全的在线体验。使用Block Party过滤掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，并控制您的在线体验。
Block Party打造的工具可以防止網絡濫用。我們的使命是通過構建用戶控制、保護和安全的解決方案來創造更安全的在線體驗。使用Block Party過濾掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，並控制您的在線體驗。

previous.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
previous.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態

next.excerpt: Glyphs 3 is a Mac font editor that puts you in control: quickly draw high-precision vectors, efficiently reuse shapes, and easily manage any number of letters, figures and symbols.
next.title: Glyphs 3.0 - Build, edit and manage fonts on your Mac

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字体编辑器，让你掌控一切：快速绘制高精度矢量，高效重用形状，轻松管理任意数量的字母、数字和符号。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、编辑和管理字体。

localize.description: Glyphs 3是一款Mac字體編輯器，讓你掌控一切：快速繪製高精度矢量，高效重用形狀，輕鬆管理任意數量的字母、數字和符號。
localize.tagline: 在 Mac 上建立、編輯和管理字體。
